question: All animals need time to transition to their new home, are you willing to work with that animal until the transition is complete
Some animals will need training, in that event, are you willing to provide the proper training
Are you prepared to care for this animal for the rest of it's life? Depending on the animal, that could be 10-15 years.
Bad pet habits I cannot tolerate are:
Reasons that may force me to give up my pet are:
values: new spouse does not like pet

question: Please tell us anything else you would like us to know about you or the type of pet you are looking for
